name: CKFetchShareParticipantsOperation
desc: An operation that converts user identities into share participants.

items.name: init(userIdentityLookupInfos: [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo])
items.desc: Creates an operation for generating share participants from the specified user data.

items.name: var userIdentityLookupInfos: [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]?
items.desc: The user data for the participants.

items.name: var fetchShareParticipantsCompletionBlock: ((Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute when the operation finishes.
